title: PSG想用270m買古天奴俾屁馬玩屎眼

replies.msg:
Paris Saint-Germain have reportedly offered €270m for Philippe Coutinho – just six months after he moved to Barcelona.

The 26-year-old joined Barcelona from Liverpool in January for a reported €160m, but the Parisians are prepared to test their resolve with a huge offer.

According to Mundo Deportivo, club representatives have already held talks with Coutinho and his entourage in a bid to convince him to join.


With Ronaldo set to leave Real Madrid and Neymar reportedly unsettled in Paris, there is a genuine fear that he may depart, but signing Coutinho could change that.

The pair have been best friends since featuring for Brazil Under-16s together in 2008 and share great chemistry both on and off the pitch.
